DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : All patient must sign informed consent . Male female patient age > = 40 year < = 80 year All patient must diagnose COPD must meet follow spirometric criterion : postbronchodilator force expiratory volume 1 second ( FEV1 ) < 70 % forced vital capacity ( FVC ) Screening Visit ( Visit 1 ) . All patient relatively stable COPD ( i.e . COPD exacerbation within 4 week prior Screening Visit ) . All patient receive selective surgical procedure lobectomy right bilobectomy segmentectomy general anaesthesia , whilst estimate time surgical procedure last less 2 hour , estimate time general anaesthesia last less 3 hour longer 5 hour . Patients must able perform study relate procedure include technically acceptable pulmonary function test ( PFTs ) . Exclusion criterion : Patients need maintenance treatment bronchodilator ( include anticholinergic , ßagonists , xanthine ) .
